To find her 16th birthday, we add 16 years to her birth year, resulting in 2016. Since 2016 is also a leap year, the last day of February falls on 02/29/2016, making this the correct date for her 16th birthday.
reasonings.D: Option (D) 02/29/1980 is incorrect because Jane was born in 2000, and her 16th birthday would be 16 years after that, which would be in 2016, not 1980.
reasonings.E: Option (E) 01/16/2016 is incorrect because Jane was born on the last day of February, which is either February 28 or February 29 (in a leap year). Since she was born in 2000, a leap year, her birthdate would be February 29, 2000. Therefore, her 16th birthday cannot be in January.
reasonings.F: Option (F) 02/28/2016 is incorrect because Jane was born on the last day of February in 2000, which is February 29 (a leap year). Since her 16th birthday would also be on February 29, February 28 would be the day before her birthday, not her actual birthday.
